title: Natsu e no Tobira Never end ver.
description: is a song included in Love Live!! Sunshine!! Duo & Trio Collection CD Vol. 1 Summer Vacation which was released on August 2, 2017. It is sung by Riko Sakurauchi, Hanamaru Kunikida, and Mari Ohara.
